The following resources are in the fields of parallel, distributed computing, artificial intelligence, machine learning, data mining. Many of the journals were picked out from the top ranking of Journal Citation Reports from Web of Science.

  • ACM
  • IEEE
  • USENIX
  • Elsevier
  • Springer
  • People, Lab, Organization
  • Courses, Workshops
  • Software, Industry

ACM SIG

  • SIGACT, Algorithms and Computation Theory
    • ACM Symposium on Parallelism in Algorithms and Architectures, in ACM-DL
    • ACM Symposium on Principles of Distributed Computing, in ACM-DL
    • News, in ACM-DL
  • SIGAI, Artificial Intelligence
  • SIGEVO, Genetic and Evolutionary Computation
  • SIGKDD, Data mining, data science and analytics community
    • KDD(International Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining), in ACM-DL
    • Explorations Newsletter, in ACM-DL
  • SIGHPC, High performance computing
  • SIGPLAN, Programming Languages
    • ACM Symposium on Principles and Practice of Parallel Programming
    • OOPLSA, SPLASH(Systems, Programming, Languages, and Applications: Software for Humanity), (part of SPLASH conference)
    • European Conference on Object-Oriented Programming, (sponsored by AITO)
    • SIGPLAN Notices, in ACM-DL
  • SIGARCH, Computer Architecture
    • Computer Architecture News
  • SIGMETRICS, performance evaluation
    • Performance Evaluation Review

ACM Transactions/Journals

  • Intelligent Systems and Technology, in ACM-DL
  • Computing Surveys, in ACM-DL
  • Journal of the ACM

ACM magazines

  • Conmunications

ACM Conferences
